pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of manuscripts jointly written by Hollywood actors George and Olive Kirby Larkin, mostly mystery scripts for radio, stage and film. Personal material includes a book, clippings, other printed material, photographs, postcards and prints. Includes an undated script, "Bulldog Courage," and some unidentified radio audition material.
